channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Account
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Account

item.title: CVE-2023-42540|2023-11-07T07:49:38.507Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.01.1 allows attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2023-42546|2023-11-07T07:49:44.951Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in startAgreeToDisclaimerActivity in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.00.7 allows attackers to access arbitrary file with Samsung Account privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-42550|2023-11-07T07:49:49.126Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in startSignIn in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.00.7 allows attackers to access arbitrary file with Samsung Account privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-42551|2023-11-07T07:49:50.113Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in startTncActivity in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.00.7 allows attackers to access arbitrary file with Samsung Account privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-42547|2023-11-07T07:49:46.204Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in startEmailValidationActivity in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.00.7 allows attackers to access arbitrary file with Samsung Account privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-42548|2023-11-07T07:49:47.191Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in startMandatoryCheckActivity in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.00.7 allows attackers to access arbitrary file with Samsung Account privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-42549|2023-11-07T07:49:48.167Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in startNameValidationActivity in Samsung Account prior to version 14.5.00.7 allows attackers to access arbitrary file with Samsung Account privilege.
